attributes.action: We should have the same freedom if we don’t have the vaccine like the others
attributes.additional_details: Not forcing us by saying you can’t travel pubs shops and manny more that means is still compulsory and they are the ones who forced them to ask us for a vaccine certificate I just wanna feel free like before with rights
attributes.background: Like before in past people should have freedom what they wanna do with their body is their business and their choice
